alert.note: Alert for Lancaster (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 8:43PM EDT until September 08 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Lancaster County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 930 PM EDT. * At 843 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Quarryville, moving northeast at 25 mph. Numerous trees have been reported to be downed from this storm. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Quarryville, Gap, Wakefield, Christiana, Georgetown, Kirkwood, Little Britain and Buck. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Stay inside a well built structure and keep away from windows.
